biotools.summary:
An Online Platform for Automated NGS Data Analysis and Sharing.
CSI NGS Portal is an online platform for fully automated NGS data analysis and sharing .
CSI NGS Portal uses a single, randomly generated, persistent, secure and http-only browser cookie for the sole purpose of user recognition for data authorisation.
